Hi I am Nikhil More & I am associated with Rigel Networks as the Marketing Manager. To tell you more about my company, Rigel Networks is a Global Technology Solutions provider Company serving Independent Software Vendors, Tech Start-Ups and SMEs. We provide complete custom business solution across several verticals including Information Technology, Hospitality, Home Health Care, Retail, Construction & Roofing, Video Security Telecom, Mortgage and Finance. What sets us apart from our competition is that we convert business hindrances and technological challenges into business boosting opportunities. We have global footprint with offices in US, EU and multiple offshore development centers in Gujarat, India.

We are a One Stop Solution provider, and our services span across custom application development, migration & re-engineering, testing services and offshore remote infrastructure management and application support. We have expertise in database, data mining, dashboard with analytics and comprehensive reporting. We deliver SaaS enabled applications, Enterprise Applications, Web 2.0 & Social Networking Portals, Dashboard &Business Intelligence Applications, Ecommerce Solutions, ECM & CRM applications, Database Applications, Mobile Applications on iPhone - iPad, Android, Blackberry, Windows Mobile & Symbian operating systems, Web &Desktop Software, and Comprehensive Reporting Solutions. We execute simple & complex projects using different Project methodologies such as Agile methodology, Iterative methodology, Waterfall methodology.

We build and grow individual relationships through our unique Customer Centric Global Engagement Model which combines short term on-site resources, local functional and project management support in US and EU along with cost, scale, and quality advantages of long term off-shore operations in India. We believe in providing solutions to clients leveraging additional advantage over competition.
